title: The Time Has Come
description: Delves into the life of a man at a crossroads, grappling with the choices he’s made and the impact they’ve had on his relationships, career, and identity, all while exploring themes of personal growth, redemption, and the inevitability of change as time moves forward.

title: I Want a Better Catastrophe
description: An existential manual for tragic optimists, can-do pessimists, and compassionate doomers.

title: My Government Means to Kill Me
description: A fierce and riveting queer coming-of-age story following the personal and political awakening of a young gay Black man in 1980s New York City.

title: Pride and Protest
description: A woman goes head-to-head with the CEO of a corporation threatening to destroy her neighborhood.

title: Forget a Mentor, Find a Sponsor
description: To fast-track your career, you need a sponsor—a senior-level champion who believes in your potential and advocates for your raise or promotion.

title: The Midnight Library
description: A compelling journey of self-discovery as a woman explores alternate lives to undo her regrets, only to realize that the perfect life may not exist.

title: The First Days
description: Two women from different worlds unite to survive in a harsh, post-apocalyptic reality, discovering inner strength amidst constant danger.

title: The Hunger Games
description: Could you survive on your own in the wild, with every one out to make sure you don't live to see the morning?

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Harry Potter is about to start his fifth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Unlike most schoolboys, Harry never enjoys his summer holidays

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: The romantic clash between the opinionated Elizabeth and her proud beau, Mr. Darcy, is a splendid performance of civilized sparring.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: The unforgettable novel of a childhood in a sleepy Southern town and the crisis of conscience that rocked it. 'To Kill A Mockingbird' became both an instant bestseller

title: The Fault in Our Stars
description: Despite the tumor-shrinking medical miracle that has bought her a few years, Hazel has never been anything but terminal, her final chapter inscribed upon diagnosis.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: Oscar Wilde's only novel is the dreamlike story of a young man who sells his soul for eternal youth and beauty.

title: The Giving Tree
description: 'Once there was a tree...and she loved a little boy.'So begins a story of unforgettable perception, beautifully written and illustrated by the gifted and versatile Shel Silverstein.

title: Gone with the Wind
description: Scarlett O'Hara, the beautiful, spoiled daughter of a well-to-do Georgia plantation owner, must use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman's March to the Sea.

title: The Lightning Thief
description: Percy Jackson is a good kid, but he can't seem to focus on his schoolwork or control his temper. And lately, being away at boarding school is only getting worse - Percy could have sworn his pre-algebra teacher turned into a monster and tried to kill him

title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
description: When Alice sees a white rabbit take a watch out of its waistcoat pocket she decides to follow it, and a sequence of most unusual events is set in motion. This mini book contains the entire topsy-turvy stories of Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

title: Divergent
description: On an appointed day of every year, all sixteen-year-olds must select the faction to which they will devote the rest of their lives. For Beatrice, the decision is between staying with her family and being who she really is

title: The Alchemist
description: Paulo Coelho's masterpiece tells the mystical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure.

title: Four Thousand Weeks
description: Nobody needs to be told there isn't enough time. We're obsessed with our lengthening to-do lists, overfilled inboxes, work-life balance, and ceaseless battle against distraction; we're deluged with advice on becoming more productive and efficient

title: Deep Work
description: A guide to achieving focus in a distracted world and producing meaningful work.

title: Atomic Habits
description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.
A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the perils of totalitarianism.

title: Becoming
description: Michelle Obama's memoir about her experiences and journey in life.

title: Dune
description: A science fiction novel about politics, religion, and ecology on a desert planet.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian novel that critiques contemporary social norms and technological advancement.

title: Educated
description: A memoir recounting the author's struggles and triumphs growing up in a survivalist family.

title: The Art of War
description: An ancient Chinese military treatise offering strategic advice.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A classic novel about adolescent alienation and rebellion.

title: Think and Grow Rich
description: A personal development and self-help book focused on achieving success.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: A psychological novel exploring morality, guilt, and redemption.

title: A Brief History of Time
description: Stephen Hawking's exploration of the universe and its mysteries.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: An overview of human history, culture, and evolution.

title: The Road
description: A haunting post-apocalyptic novel of survival and love.

title: Meditations
description: The philosophical writings of Marcus Aurelius on stoicism.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A tragic love story set in the Jazz Age.

title: The Lean Startup
description: A methodology for starting and managing businesses effectively.

title: The Hobbit
description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on a grand adventure in this timeless fantasy classic.

title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
description: A guide to personal and professional effectiveness.
